summary: I WAS DRIVING ABOUT 40 MPH, WHEN I RAN OVER A PIECE OF METAL THAT WAS ABOUT THE SIZE OF A RULER.  I HEARD A LOUD BANG, AND THEN I GOT HOME, FOUND THAT GAS WAS POURING OUT OF THE GAS TANK.  IT HAD BEEN PUNCTURED.  OBVIOUSLY, WE ALL COULD HAVE BEEN KILLED IF THERE WAS A SPARK.  I WOULD NOT HAVE EXPECTED A GAS TANK TO SO EASILY PUNCTURED.  *JB      ***DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS****744064
